condition.ptxt: (With a very light drag is present in all disc brakes immediately after pedal is released)

ps.ptxt: Master cylinder pistons not returning correctly

action.ptxt: Check for soft hoses or damaged pipes and replace with new hoes and/or new brake pipes.

ps.ptxt: Incorrect parking brake adjustment on rear brake

action.ptxt: Check and adjust to correct specifications.

ps.ptxt: Weakened or broken return springs in the rear brake
Wheel cylinder or brake caliper piston sticking

action.ptxt: Check system and replace as necessary.
